task: Record a USD 10 transport expense by selecting the 交通 category, entering the amount, adding a note about the trip, and finalizing the entry.
task_end_condition: The task is known to be completed when the transport expense is successfully recorded and reflected in the summary view on the main screen.

working_memory.description: Touch on a dropdown field that has text "現金"

The dropdown field labeled "資產" has been expanded to show the available options, and the previously selected option "現金" is now marked as checked. Additionally, a new button labeled "帳戶" has appeared, indicating that there are more selection options related to assets.

The user pressed the "BACK" button, which led to the display of a new button labeled "收入" and a selected button labeled "支出." Additionally, the previously checked button "現金" was removed from the current screen, indicating a change in the selection state of the financial options.
